summary: Changes Lydia in to Beautyful Lydia. She also fight with an Battleaxe and her Voice is very Cute now.
descriptionHtml:
Changes Lydia in to Beautyful Lydia. She also fight with an Battleaxe and her Voice is very Cute now. 

Installation:
-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Just Put the ESP and BSA Files in your Skyrim Data Folder and enable it with the Manager.

Deinstallation:
-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Erase the Lydia files from your Skyrim Data Folder.
author: LordDenethor
